structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases
Post Conviction Access To Forensic And Scientific Analysis

law.catch_line: Additional Analysis Ordered Upon Inconclusive Findings
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 38 effective May 17, 2012.] If the analysis is inconclusive, the court may order any additional analysis requested if the court concludes that the requirements of subsection (b) of section 7 are met.
